BlogHomeCard.BlogHomeCardDetails: Face of Art Technologies TMS minimizes fraud by recording every toll transaction and incident in each lane, optimizes traffic flow with fast vehicle processing speed, provides better management with advanced reports on traffic, toll income, personal activities, maintenance required, and maintenance performed. We Face of Art Technologies Are Glad To Announce That we have started Providing Cyber Security Services to Our Global Clients 1 Website Security Audit: Comprehensive of a website's security vulnerabilities and recommendations for improvement.2 Penetration Testing: Controlled simulated cyber-attacks on a website to identify potential weaknesses and vulnerabilities.3 Web Application Firewall (WAF) Setup: Configuring and implementing a WAF to protect against common web-based attacks, such as SQL injection and cross-site scripting (XSS).4 Malware Detection and Removal: Scanning websites for malware infections and removing any malicious code or scripts.
